mapper.update: CREATE TABLE friend_accept_#{id} ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, from_user BIGINT NOT NULL, accept_date DATETIME NOT NULL, accept BIGINT NOT NULL, users_id BIGINT NOT NULL );
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.nickname, u.profile_img_url AS profileImgUrl, f.accept_date AS acceptDate, f.accept FROM users u JOIN friend_accept_#{userId} f ON u.id = f.from_user
